documents.content: Malaysian market analysis techniques: 1) PEST analysis considering local political stability 2) Consumer behavior patterns during festive seasons 3) Impact of government policies like MyDIGITAL 4) E-commerce trends in urban vs rural areas 5) Digital payment adoption rates.

Data visualization best practices for Malaysian reports: 1) Color schemes considering cultural meanings 2) Bilingual labeling (EN/BM) 3) Currency formatting in RM 4) Date formats DD/MM/YYYY 5) Population demographics by state and ethnicity.
